1326.89.text:
anybody who's important in
the last 50 god damn years,

1329.76.text: the thing that most excites me,

1331.13.text:
is that you're 
sitting right here,

1333.53.text:
I have no interest in
doing anything other.

1335.70.text:
That to me is the most
interesting thing

1337.47.text:
that's happening 
in this room right now,

1338.97.text:
is that while 
I'm doing this interview,

1340.41.text:
the parallel part 
of my brain is saying,

1344.16.text:
"This is exactly what 
I'm gonna be doing."

1354.72.text:
- Alright, how do your thoughts
on your ability in business

1360.59.text:
Do you use the 
principles at home--

1363.40.text:
- I think first of all,
I'm an EQ-HR-driven CEO.

1366.67.text: I think I win not on my IQ,

1369.77.text:
I think that I'm very in
tune to people's feelings.

1373.01.text:
I try to reverse engineer
what they're about.

1375.21.text:
For example, I have 
no interest in my kids

1377.51.text: being anything but who they are.

1379.18.text:
My mom gifted me by
parenting me to my strengths.

1382.98.text:
If my kids are artists or
want to be in the non-profit

1385.99.text:
sector or climb mountains, 
I'm all-in.

1388.95.text: I want them to do them.

1390.62.text:
The one line in the sand I have
is no eighth place trophies.

1394.56.text:
Lizzie knows, and now I'm
looking at the camera,

1396.46.text:
'cause I want her 
to see my eyes again,

1400.27.text:
Life is about winning and
losing. It's binary, right?

1403.44.text: So as long as my kids know that,

1404.90.text: I don't care what they do.

1405.97.text: They don't need to make money.

1406.97.text:
They don't need to be
entrepreneurs, but to win,

1410.91.text:
To be a great artist, to be
great at helping other people,

1413.71.text: you have to be great at it.

1414.88.text:
- Does your wife get
involved in your business?

1417.05.text:
- No, we have a very
strong line in the sand.

1421.89.text:
Her parents had 
that for the most part,

1423.89.text:
so I think we're 
just kind of acting

1429.43.text:
Look, when you're 
the CEO of a company,

1433.90.text:
you're only in the
negative issues business.

1438.30.text:
All I'm dealing 
with is headaches.

1441.17.text:
I'm gonna step outta here, and
I'm gonna look at my phone,

1443.18.text:
and there's gonna be seven
things I have to deal with

1444.71.text:
that isn't a fun 
thing to deal with.

1446.81.text:
So to come home and pour that
on my wife isn't interesting.

1450.02.text:
I don't have 
anything positive to say.

1451.92.text:
On a micro level, 
it's all negative.

1453.39.text:
It's the macro 
level that's awesome.

1457.66.text:
Great meeting you.
- Thank you, brother,

1459.39.text:
- [Larry] This is the
first of many meetings.
